alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 5:58PM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with heavier amounts at the highest elevations in the White Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Forest Lakes, Ganado, Heber-Overgaard, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue, heavy at times, in northeast Arizona and the White Mountains through late this evening. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Buffalo Pass 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Ganado 1 to 2 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Payson 1 to 2 inches Pine-Strawberry 1 to 3 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Whiteriver 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
